question: User cant login or forgot password
answer: Please use the “Forgot Password” link in the “Login” area to reset your password.

question: User wants Delete Account
answer: In order to ensure that the sender of this request is the account holder we request that the account holder login to their account and delete their account in the "My Account" section. To delete your account please navigate to the "My Account" area and choose "delete my account".

question: User wants to change account email
answer: To change your email please navigate to the "My Account" area and click on "change email address".

question: Change payment method (Check if they pay via Segpay)
answer: If you paid using Segpay, Please navigate to our processors consumer portal here: https://cs.segpay.com/

question: Pricing
answer: For information about pricing and our pricing plans please press the "upgrade" button in the menu to see all plans available.

question: iTunes/Apple Account Cancellation:
answer: If you signed up through iTunes/Apple. You can cancel your subscription through your settings. Here are the instructions: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039

question: How to change state filter
answer: Apologies but there is no way to adjust someone's state. We currently only offer country selection in the chat.

question: What is the name of your other website for adults that don't mind nudity
answer: We are not able to recommend any other sites. We apologize for the inconvenience.

question: How to turn on and off translator
answer: To change this setting please navigate to the settings icon and you will be able to adjust it there.

question: Swipe Feature
answer: The beauty of [brand] lies in its simplicity. You can connect to a partner via video chat in just a couple of clicks. You also have the option to make a new connection just by clicking on the “Next” button and you will connect with a new partner.

question: crypto Cancellation
answer: We currently do not offer subscriptions for crypto payments.

question: General Settings Change
answer: To change this setting please navigate to the settings icon and you will be able to adjust it there.

question: Google Play Account Cancellation
answer: If you signed up through Google Play. You can cancel your subscription through your Google. Here are the instructions: https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/7018481?co=GENIE.Platform%3DAndroid&hl=en

question: Nobody appear on cam I click start and the hearth is flashing but nothing happen:
answer: I'm sorry to hear you are experiencing this issue. Kindly reset your browser, clear cache, cookies and restart.

question: How can I use the private chat function?
answer: You can use "start private chat" button to start a private chat.

question: Users complaining/reporting IA or Nudity
answer: We do not tolerate any illegal activity on our platform and promptly ban any reported users that violate our AUP and report such cases to law enforcement. We ask our users to help us by reporting such instances so we can promptly remove and ban such users from our platform. If you believe that you were banned by mistake, you can appeal the decision in most cases if this option is available on the ban dialog.

question: Want/Can't connect to a Specific Country
answer: If a country is not showing that means there are not enough users online at the moment to connect with in that country.

question: No Refund Due
answer: As stated in our terms: Payments are nonrefundable

question: User was banned for underage
answer: You have been banned for being underage, If you believe that you were banned by mistake, you can appeal the decision in most cases if this option is available on the ban dialog.

question: Users Asking if the will get Banned on Public
answer: We cannot advise users on personal actions. Please refer to our acceptable use policy for details.

question: For how long are the materials(personal and sensitive data) saved on your website?:
answer: For this information if you can please refer to our privacy policy it has all the information regarding personal data collection and storage.

question: Can't Hear Other People Complaint
answer: This can happen for various reasons:1. Your sound settings may need adjustment.  You can do a sound test here: https://www.onlinemictest.com/sound-test/2. The other person has their mic disabled.If issue still persist, please reset your browser, clear cache, cookies and restart.

question: Billing Support Escalation
answer: We will need to have our Billing Support Team check on this issue

question: Cant log into account
answer: Thank you for contacting us. We would love to help you solve the problem you’re having. Have you tried resetting your password? Most of the time that should resolve the problem.

question: Gender Filter
answer: If you would like to chat with a specific gender only you can use the gender filter on the chat.

question: Webcam Issues
answer: This can happen for various reasons:1. Your denied permission for webcam on our site2. Your webcam is not working with browser. For this please do a webcam test to find the issue: https://www.onlinemictest.com/webcam-test/If issue still persist, please reset your browser, clear cache, cookies and restart.

question: How to change the Auto Message Settings
answer: To change this setting please navigate to the settings icon and you will be able to adjust your intro message setting there.

question: Back Button Feature
answer: The way the back button feature works is it can only be used once per connection.

question: I want a Refund
answer: As stated in our terms: Payments are nonrefundable

question: Cancel my membership
answer: Here are the instructions to easily cancel your membership. To cancel your membership please log into your account area. Then under your membership status click the “Details” button and then the “Cancel Membership” button.

question: I'm Without email access, Can't Cancel ; No Cancellation Button;
answer: Thank you for reaching out to us! When you fill out the cancelation form an email is sent to the billing email on file.  Since you did not receive this email I will provide you with the link to our payment processor, they have a self serve system to cancel and 24/7 live support online and by phone.  Here is the link: https://cs.segpay.com/

question: Some users threaten to spread my data (Extortion)
answer: We advise users to never give out their personal information when talking to strangers online.  We are not able to do anything on our end as we do not have partner logs of who you connected with.

question: Male User Pretending Female Complaint
answer: Please flag any user that you encounter that is setting themselves as female when they're not. We greatly appreciate you reporting this.

question: Can you please help me to remove block?
answer: I'm sorry, but based on the context provided, it seems that your account was blocked for violating the Acceptable Use Policy of our website. If you believe that you were banned by mistake, you can appeal the decision in most cases if this option is available on the ban dialog.

question: I am not pairing with anyone
answer: Usually this problem occurs when filters are selected. Please try removing interest tags and country filters and try again, this usually fixes the issue of not being able to connect to female partners.

question: I am seeing people from two sites
answer: It is possible to see people from both services/brands if you use both sites.

question: what is my purchase id
answer: You can find your purchase ID in your email when you completed the purchase. We are not able to give out purchase IDs

question: I go to segpay and its not finding the record
answer: If you are really having troubles, Kindly call segpay as they are our payment processor and they will help you cancel your account.;

question: Escalete the problem to an human agent
answer: [Click here](#escalate) to escalate to an agent.
